Creating Custom Templates

If you are installing CareSuite for the first time, Picis recommends that you do the following:

l Delete the sample templates that will not be used at your hospital.

l Customize the templates for the units that where CareSuite is installed.

l If a unit will use multiple templates, customize the corresponding default template and use it as a master for the rest. Keep the number of templates to a minimum to reduce maintenance and upgrade work.

 

 

How to...

l Open a template for editing

l Create a new template

l Set the encounter type

l Save a template
